sqlMap.select: /* message.retrieveDefaultMessage */ SELECT DISTINCT E.LOCL_CD locale, F.MSG_ID code, CASE WHEN (SELECT 1 FROM SY_MSG WHERE USE_YN = 'Y' AND SYS_CD = E.SYS_CD AND LOCL_CD = E.LOCL_CD AND MSG_ID = F.MSG_ID) IS NULL THEN F.MSG_NM ELSE (SELECT MSG_NM FROM SY_MSG WHERE USE_YN = 'Y' AND SYS_CD = E.SYS_CD AND LOCL_CD = E.LOCL_CD AND MSG_ID = F.MSG_ID) END message FROM SY_LOCL E JOIN (SELECT C.SYS_CD, C.MSG_ID, C.MSG_NM FROM SY_MSG C WHERE C.SYS_CD = #sysCd# AND C.USE_YN = 'Y') F ON (E.SYS_CD = F.SYS_CD)

/* message.retrieveMessageList */ SELECT SYS_CD SYS_CD ,MSG_ID AS CODE ,LOCL_CD AS LOCALE_CD ,MSG_NM AS MESSAGE ,MSG_EXPL AS RMK ,DUTY_SYS_CD ,USE_YN FROM SY_MSG WHERE SYS_CD = 'sheepshare'
( DUTY_SYS_CD = #dutySysCd# OR DUTY_SYS_CD = 'CO' )
MSG_ID LIKE '%' || #queryCode# || '%'
MSG_NM LIKE '%' || #queryMessage# || '%'
LOCL_CD = #localeCd#
ORDER BY MSG_ID ASC

/* message.retrieveMessage */ SELECT MSG_ID AS CODE ,MSG_NM AS MESSAGE FROM SY_MSG WHERE SYS_CD = 'sheepshare'
MSG_NM = #commCdNm#

/* message.checkMessageExist */ SELECT MSG_ID AS CODE FROM SY_MSG WHERE SYS_CD = 'sheepshare'
MSG_NM = #commCdNm#
